Title: Removes the requirement that consent for the payment of certain medical services must occur after such services are administered
Summary: Removes the requirement that consent for the payment of certain medical services must occur after such services are administered.
LawCode: Amd ยง18-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to removing the requirement that consent for the payment of certain medical services must occur after such services are administered
